items.name: Arjun Nair
items.text: The best wood-fired pizza in Kochi, hands down. The crust is perfectly thin and smoky. The Don Pollo is a must-try!

items.name: Sarah Thomas
items.text: A total hidden gem in Panampilly Nagar. The place is small but the vibes are so cozy. Feels like a little European cafe.

items.name: Rahul Krishna
items.text: I didn't think Kerala Beef Fry would work on a pizza, but it is absolute magic. Spicy, flavorful, and unique. Highly recommended.

items.name: Sneha P.
items.text: Finally, authentic sourdough pizza! You can taste the quality of the dough. It's light, airy, and doesn't leave you feeling heavy.

items.name: Mohammed Fayas
items.text: The Basque Cheesecake is to die for. I come here just for dessert sometimes. Great service and lovely interiors.

items.name: Anjali Menon
items.text: Love the open kitchen concept! Watching the pizzas go into the wood-fired oven adds to the whole experience. 5/5 stars.

items.name: David George
items.text: The Peach Lavender Mojito is so refreshing. It pairs perfectly with their spicy meat pizzas. My go-to spot for dinner.

items.name: Lakshmi R.
items.text: Premium quality ingredients. You can tell they don't cut corners. It's a bit pricey but totally worth it for the taste.

items.name: Vivek S.
items.text: Great spot for a date night. The lighting is warm and the music is just right. Not too loud, just good vibes and great food.

items.name: Meera John
items.text: The Wild Mushroom pizza was incredible. Even as a vegetarian, I was blown away by the flavors. Definitely coming back.
